topic.title: How to Create Localization CSS for Another Language

body.p: To localize for your language (let say Dutch, language code nl), use the following procedure:

ol.li:
Copy and paste in your customization css the contents of the following files:
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/core/-i18n-de.css and
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/print/p-i18n-de.css

Open in an editor the English localization files, side by side with your customization CSS:
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/core/-i18n-en.css
[PLUGIN_DIR]css/print/p-i18n-en.css
Translate each of the strings from your customization, using the English localization as reference.
